name: TuyaSmartBeaconKit
prefix_header_contents:
#ifdef __OBJC__
   #import <YYModel/YYModel.h>
   #import <TuyaSmartUtil/TuyaSmartUtil.h>
   #ifndef TYBLogMacro
       #define TYBLogMacro
       #define TYBLogDebug(...)         TYSDKLog(0, @"TuyaSmartBeaconKit", __FILE__, __PRETTY_FUNCTION__, __LINE__, ##__VA_ARGS__)
       #define TYBLogInfo(...)         TYSDKLog(1, @"TuyaSmartBeaconKit", __FILE__, __PRETTY_FUNCTION__, __LINE__, ##__VA_ARGS__)
       #define TYBLogWarn(...)         TYSDKLog(2, @"TuyaSmartBeaconKit", __FILE__, __PRETTY_FUNCTION__, __LINE__, ##__VA_ARGS__)
       #define TYBLogError(...)         TYSDKLog(3, @"TuyaSmartBeaconKit", __FILE__, __PRETTY_FUNCTION__, __LINE__, ##__VA_ARGS__)
   #endif
#endif
